page.description: Checks if a specified column is part of a table's primary key.

prototypes.prototype: DIM result AS L = ColumnIsInPrimaryKey(ColumnIndex as N)

description.p: The index of the column to test.
Returns *[xb:.t.]* if the column matching the index requested is part of the table's primary key. Otherwise, *[xb:.f.]*.
